titleStmt.title: The Arrian's vindication of himself against Dr. Wallis's fourth letter on the Trinity
titleStmt.author: Freke, William, 1662-1744.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Freke. Cf. McLachlan, H. The story of a nonconformist library, 1923, p. 64.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, NewYork.
